text: Have been patronising this stall since they were at Blk 109 Bt Batok to 177 Bt Batok and now the current location. My kids love their traditional hand torn mee hoon kueh or U Mian. Their braised pork belly rice is shiok too. Pork belly melts in the mouth. This stall also sells fish or seafood soup but my family always goes for the noodles or mee hoon kueh.

Absolutely one of the best fish🐟 soup in the west👍🏻💯 love the fish slices that are not only quite chunky but more importantly, taste super fresh😍 My go to is the sliced fish bee hoon with additional fish slices(+$2) and a dash of milk - simply heavenly🤤 Stall owners are quite friendly too. Have been patronising whenever I’m in the area and I hope this stall will continue to operate in this food court for many, many years to come🥹 太好吃了!!!🤩🌟

Delicious fish soup.
Light and refreshing good to be part of your everyday diet.
Tasty ingredients, well marinated minced pork, crispy fried fish.
Fellow Bukit Batok residents please support!
Luckily came in earlier…. Fried fish Soup sold out … fish head soup also sold out…
Delicious fish soup with fresh sizable fish slices
